hero.location: Santa Rosa, La Pampa • 7+ Years of Experience
hero.heroDescription: I help businesses in Santa Rosa modernize with technology. Custom software, security improvements, and continuous IT support.

services.servicesDescription: Complete software solutions from modernization to maintenance
services.digitalModernizationDesc: Modern websites, web applications, and internal systems to digitize your business.
services.automationDesc: Optimize your operations with automated scheduling, notifications, and invoicing.
services.securityDesc: Protect your business with proper backups, access control, and data protection.
services.maintenanceDesc: Continuous support with updates, monitoring, and technical assistance.

industries.industriesDescription: Customized solutions for different business sectors in Santa Rosa and the region
industries.healthcareDesc: Appointment systems, patient data management, and clinical administration tools.
industries.realEstateDesc: Online property catalogs, management tools, and customer relationship systems.
industries.lawFirmsDesc: Case management systems, calendar tools, and document organization.
industries.localShopsDesc: Simple websites, online sales integrations, and inventory management.
industries.automotiveDesc: Workshop management systems, service scheduling, and customer tracking.
industries.manufacturingDesc: Inventory control, production tracking, and quality management.
industries.educationDesc: Learning platforms, student management, and administrative systems.
industries.restaurantsDesc: Online ordering systems, reservation management, and inventory control.
industries.creativeDesc: Digital portfolios, project management, and invoicing systems.
industries.constructionDesc: Project management, cost control, and construction tracking.
industries.logisticsDesc: Shipment tracking, fleet management, and route optimization.
industries.financialDesc: Analytics tools, customer management, and automated reporting.

team.teamDescription: An experienced team of software developers led by Enzo Loyola. With over 7 years of combined experience, we help local businesses in Santa Rosa modernize their operations with customized technological solutions.
team.ceoExpertiseDesc: Leads technical and strategic vision, specialized in backend with Java and Spring Boot
team.teamExperienceDesc: Team specialized in frontend, backend, and full-stack development with modern technologies
team.completeSolutionsDesc: From initial development to continuous maintenance and support
